title: Male Military Radio Voice Clips Vol. I
description: A set of 99 unique phrases involving military chatter.
longDescription:
A set of 99 unique phrases involving military chatter.Â 


Each phrase is available in 3 versions imitating different types of radio.


Files include modern military commands, responses, and expressions suitable for infantry, commandos, tanks, vehicles, warships, navy, air force pilots, officers, and similar characters and units.


Preview:


https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6spdipnzLqo
technicalDetails:
Features: 298 stereo .wav sound effects.


Files Included:

Copy That, Enemy Spotted, Fire At Will, Hostiles, Engaging Enemy, Stay Low, Cover Me, Grenades, Man Down, Objective Taken, Target Destroyed, Roger That, Wait For My Signal, Affirmative, Negative, Target Spotted, Take Cover, Fire In The Hole, Hold Them Off, Out Of Ammo, Objective Lost, Mission Completed, Order Received, Visual On The Target, Get Into Position, Opening Fire, Go Go Go, Flank Them, Help, Taking Casualties, Reinforcements Have Arrived, Abort Mission, Target Hit, Order Acknowledged, Enemy Engaged, Open Fire, Reload, Under Heavy Enemy Fire, I'm Hit, Grenade, Requesting Assistance, The Cavalry Has Arrived, Objective Failed, Operation Successful, Understood, All Clear, Move Out, Target In Range, Engaging Target, Fire, Covering Fire, We're Under Fire, I'm Shot, Target Lost, Mission Accomplished, Attack Formation, Follow The Leader, Weapons Hot, Target Locked, Bombs Away, He's On My Tail, Evasive Maneuvers, I Can't Lose Him, Pull Up, Low On Fuel, Returning To Base, Standing By, I'm In Position, Medic, Requesting Immediate Support, Retreat, Freeze, Drop Your Weapon, Get Down, On The Floor Now, Mission Failed, Target Eliminated, Over, Over And Out, I'm On It, Clear, Don't Let Them Surround Us, Going In, Reloading, I'm Wounded, Tanks, Requesting Air Support, Mission Successful, Aye Aye Sir, Hold Your Fire, Sir Yes Sir, Sniper, Surround Them, Thanks, Keep Your Heads Down, Look Out, Get Out, Requesting Permission To Land, Transmission Received



Number of Audio Waves: 297

Number of Audio Cues: 297

Do Sound FX loop: No

Supported Development Platforms: All

Supported Target Build Platforms: All
